original_solution_mapping.L1: When you add up all the girls from all 4 classes, you had 12+15+9+10= <<12+15+9+10=46>>46 girls
original_solution_mapping.L2: When you add up all the boys from all 4 classes, you had 13+11+13+11 = <<13+11+13+11=48>>48 boys

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 7406.
    Returns: the total number of more boys competing than girls.
    """
    # L1
    girls_4th_class1 = 12 # The first 4th grade class had 12 girls
    girls_4th_class2 = 15 # The second 4th grade class had 15 girls
    girls_5th_class1 = 9 # The first 5th grade class had 9 girls
    girls_5th_class2 = 10 # the second 5th grade class had 10 girls
    total_girls = girls_4th_class1 + girls_4th_class2 + girls_5th_class1 + girls_5th_class2

    # L2
    boys_4th_class1 = 13 # The first 4th grade class had 13 boys
    boys_4th_class2 = 11 # The second 4th grade class had 11 boys
    boys_5th_class1 = 13 # The first 5th grade class had 13 boys
    boys_5th_class2 = 11 # the second 5th grade class had 11 boys
    total_boys = boys_4th_class1 + boys_4th_class2 + boys_5th_class1 + boys_5th_class2

    # L3
    more_boys_than_girls = total_boys - total_girls

    # FA
    answer = more_boys_than_girls
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: When you add up all the girls from all 4 classes, you had {girls_4th_class1}+{girls_4th_class2}+{girls_5th_class1}+{girls_5th_class2}= <<{girls_4th_class1}+{girls_4th_class2}+{girls_5th_class1}+{girls_5th_class2}={total_girls}>>{total_girls} girls

When you add up all the boys from all 4 classes, you had {boys_4th_class1}+{boys_4th_class2}+{boys_5th_class1}+{boys_5th_class2} = <<{boys_4th_class1}+{boys_4th_class2}+{boys_5th_class1}+{boys_5th_class2}={total_boys}>>{total_boys} boys
There are {total_boys} boys and {total_girls} girls so {total_boys}-{total_girls} = {more_boys_than_girls} more boys

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: When you add up all the boys from all 4 classes, you had 13+11+13+11 = <<13+11+13+11=48>>48 boys

explanation: Incorrect final answer. An intermediate value 'total_boys' (value: 48) was reported instead of 'more_boys_than_girls' (value: 2).
